com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class DarkRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BaseRoom
      • com.illcode.meterman.impl.DarkRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TurnListener, Room

    public class DarkRoom
extends BaseRoom
implements TurnListener
    A Room that handles darkness by returning a different name, exit name, and description if the room is dark and there is no light source. It will also conceal any entities in it if dark.

        public String getExitName()
        Description copied from interface: Room

      • exiting

        public boolean exiting(Room toRoom)
        Description copied from interface: Room
        Called as the player is exiting the room (but is still there).
        Specified by:
        exiting in interface Room
        Overrides:
        exiting in class BaseRoom
        Parameters:
        toRoom - the room the player is attempting to move to.
        Returns:
        true to block the player from exiting, false to allow the exit (note that the exit may fail for other reasons)
